name: spidertron-leg-count
title: Spidertron Leg Count
author: jeff.s
description:
Why should Spidertron have 8 legs?  You can customize the number with this mod (affects ALL spidertrons).

IMPORTANT: Due to a base game bug, Factorio will crash if you change this and then load a save that already has a spidertron on the ground.  To work around it for now: Pick up your spidertron(s), save, change this value in mod settings and restart game, and put them back down.
